data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and displayed in black font. The background is a bright yellow, which makes the text stand out prominently. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet distinctive, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 2 POWER CONTROL Ihr Anwendungsberater via App: der Kärcher K 2 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger für die Reinigung von z.B. Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen oder Gartenmöbeln. ## Text Content - Bestell-Nr.: 1.673-600.0 - Pistole mit Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Strahlrohrverstauung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278640446
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5.6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 246 × 250 × 586
## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 5
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle at the top for easy transportation. It has a prominent black logo on the front. The design includes ventilation slits on the sides and a circular dial near the bottom, likely for adjusting pressure settings. The unit is equipped with wheels for mobility. In front of the main unit, there are two black spray wands. One wand has a pointed nozzle, while the other has a wider, adjustable nozzle. These wands are used for directing the water spray. Additionally, there is a coiled black hose, which connects the main unit to the spray wands, allowing for water flow. The overall design is compact and portable, suitable for various cleaning tasks. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text: **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's claim of being the top pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and confidence of the statement. The overall design is simple yet striking, intended to catch attention and convey a message of leadership in the market. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design is simple and clean, emphasizing the origin of the product or service as being from Germany. ## Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall design suggests an emphasis on increased power or energy efficiency. ## Figure Description The image is a symbol labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable setting. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a plus sign (+) and a circular arrow, suggesting the ability to increase or adjust the power or pressure of the spray. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This symbol likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water jet.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and displayed in black font. The background is a bright yellow, which makes the text stand out prominently. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet distinctive, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 2 POWER CONTROL

Ihr Anwendungsberater via App: der Kärcher K 2 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger für die Reinigung von z.B. Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen oder Gartenmöbeln.

## Text Content

- Bestell-Nr.: 1.673-600.0

- Pistole mit Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Strahlrohrverstauung

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278640446
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 5.6
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 246 × 250 × 586

## Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 5
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image shows a yellow pressure washer with several components. The main unit is upright with a handle at the top for easy transportation. It has a prominent black logo on the front. The design includes ventilation slits on the sides and a circular dial near the bottom, likely for adjusting pressure settings. The unit is equipped with wheels for mobility.

In front of the main unit, there are two black spray wands. One wand has a pointed nozzle, while the other has a wider, adjustable nozzle. These wands are used for directing the water spray.

Additionally, there is a coiled black hose, which connects the main unit to the spray wands, allowing for water flow.

The overall design is compact and portable, suitable for various cleaning tasks.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's claim of being the top pre-sliced sandwich brand globally. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and confidence of the statement. The overall design is simple yet striking, intended to catch attention and convey a message of leadership in the market.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. The flag colors are arranged horizontally, with black on top, red in the middle, and yellow at the bottom. The design is simple and clean, emphasizing the origin of the product or service as being from Germany.

## Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon of a power plug with a lightning bolt symbol above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall design suggests an emphasis on increased power or energy efficiency.

## Figure Description

The image is a symbol labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable setting. The nozzle is shown with an arrow pointing to the right, indicating the direction of the spray. Above the nozzle, there is a plus sign (+) and a circular arrow, suggesting the ability to increase or adjust the power or pressure of the spray. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This symbol likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the water jet.
